N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 578.7 - Rates of payment

State Regulations
(a) Rates of
payment shall be established on a prospective basis. (b) Rates of payment established under this
section shall be all-inclusive, taking into account all allowable patient days
and all allowable costs. (c) Rates
of payment established pursuant to this section shall be effective for a period
of 12 months, which shall be coterminous with the residential treatment
facility's fiscal year, unless otherwise determined by the
commissioner. (d) Rates of payment
established pursuant to this section shall be provisional pending the
completion of an audit pursuant to section
578.6
of this Part. Notes
